items.name: Coolest Rock
items.description: It's a really cool rock

items.name: Bedroom Letter
items.description: The letter reads 'Running some errands! Good luck today. -Mrs. Wife'
items.inRoomDescription: A letter rests on one of your nightstands.

items.name: Bed
items.description: Your bed. Not too hard, not too soft, just right.

items.name: Telly
items.description: A $200 plasma tv. You hung it on the wall yourself! Sometimes, you could just stand there and watch television for hours.
items.inRoomDescription: A TV is set up across from your bed.

items.name: Fridge
items.description: Definitely a fridge. There are casserole leftovers, an apple, and an energy drink inside. Maybe it's time to do some grocery shopping.
items.inRoomDescription: A fridge stands next to your counters.

items.name: Pronounced Vahs
items.description: The vase holds a lovely arrangement of flowers. You see rhododendrons, petunias, tansies, and one strikingly beautiful black rose. You didn't realize you knew so many flowers.

items.name: Book Heap
items.description: Despite the pile being soggy with water, you notice the corner of a fresh, dry piece of paper sticking out of the pile.

items.name: Forbidden Note
items.description: You pull the note from the pile. The page is utterly blank. The hand that touched the note falls numb, and you double over, overcome with intense sobbing. You are pressed down to the ground by an extreme force, as if you were a bug being slowly squished. Then, as if nothing happened, you are standing in the entryway. The page is gone. Neat.

items.name: Skellington
items.description: What skeleton? (edit this out later: it disappears??)
items.inRoomDescription: A skeleton, picked clean to the bone, rests in a visible indentation on the mattress.

items.name: Cupboards
items.description: Your cupboards are all locked. Of course, how could you forget. This is a cupboard locking household! What's inside? Who cares!
items.inRoomDescription: Several cupboards are above and below your countertop.

items.name: Funky Art
items.description: You never could understand modern art.

items.name: Super Fast Drink Boy
items.description: This brand claims to give you the raw physical energy of one hundred mountain lions. You've tried it before, it's true.

items.name: Nasty Paste
items.description: Well, I am kind of hungry. I wonder...
items.inRoomDescription: An open fridge displays a pile of rotten mush that appears to have slid from the top shelves to the bottom, the fridge door rests on the floor.

items.name: Lamppost
items.description: Who put this here anyway? I don't see the point.
items.inRoomDescription: Lying on the ground beside the fingerpost is a charming electric lamppost that appears to have been torn out of the ground.

items.name: Cages
items.description: Booooooooooring, who cares! You can't even bring yourself to look that hard. Actually, it seems you are physically unable to look up. The body sure does some weird things sometimes! You notice a few tears rolling down your cheek; you wipe them away.

items.name: Nightstands
items.description: These are great at holding things.
items.inRoomDescription: Two nightstands sit on each side of the bed.

items.name: Oven
items.description: What legendary meals has this beast created?

items.name: Kitchen Letter
items.description: This lovely letter from your beloved reads 'Fuel up bro!!! - Boo Bear Sr.'
items.inRoomDescription: There is a note on the table.

items.name: Apple
items.description: You haven't seen a doctor in years thanks to these bad boys.

items.name: Legendary Casserole
items.description: A legendary meal for a legendary… what are you anyway?

items.name: Books
items.description: You've got some classics here, like Already-Solved Crossword Puzzles, How to Become a Fancy Waiter in Less than 20 Minutes, and A Coffee Table Book About Coffee Tables.

items.name: Sword
items.description: Serves a variety of purposes, but is typically used in the stabbing business.

items.name: Shield
items.description: She blocks well, and when she doesn't, you'll wish she did.

items.name: Poop Key
items.description: A diamond in the rough, a key in the outhouse. It smells.

items.name: Outhouse
items.description: Your trusty outhouse, hasn't failed you yet. You've probably used it before.

items.name: Ruined House
items.description: These shambles seem to be a house abandoned by time.

items.name: Markings
items.description: The crude canvas of cruel critters.
items.inRoomDescription: The walls are clumsily marked in an unrecognizable black matter.

items.name: Playing Cards
items.description: They're literally all aces. Every card is an ace. What were they playing?

items.name: Layered sheets
items.description: These are layered and bundled in such a fashion that it appears to be their resting area. It smells.
items.inRoomDescription: Several sheets of fabric layered across each other cover one corner of the room.

items.name: Junk Pile
items.description: There's so much garbage… could something actually useful be underneath?
items.inRoomDescription: A pile of the junk seems to have been growing along one of the walls.

items.name: Chair of Root
items.description: The dedication to their aesthetic is impressive. Still, it doesn't look too comfortable.

items.name: Great Tree
items.description: For a brief moment, you remember climbing trees as a kid, conquering taller and taller feats with your friends, knowing what it means to be happy. What was I thinking about again?

items.name: Basin
items.description: The water within is sparkling clear. You instinctively leap to drink from it, and you feel more refreshed than you can ever remember being. You don't actually remember much, but you think it is still quite special.

items.name: Tangles of Vines
items.description: Several tangles of vine sway above your head. They vary in size, but you notice they are all about as big as you are. Two of them are oozing, forming small puddles of green and red on the ground.
